concept.title: Configuring the DNS
concept.shortdesc: requires DNS mappings to work properly in a cloud hosting environment.

ul.li: For test or temporary deployment of you can use the xip.io wildcard DNS service for resolving the fixed or floating IP address of your VM instead of setting up a DNS record.

For a permanent or production system, it is recommended to create DNS A and CNAME records for the VM.
The first line uses the fixed public IP address assigned by the or a floating public IP that you have assigned to the instance.
The second line is a wildcard entry, reserved for the API endpoint used by clients and the sub-domains created for the applications deployed to .
For example, the DNS zone file for an named on example.com would have the following entries: IN A 192.0.43.11 *. IN CNAME
